name: 2D Shooter 2.0
description:
Hello,

This is MSU CAS 117 Project 2 2D Shooter 2.0. One of the modifications that I made was I added more environment astroids to level 2, and made it seem like a maze. For level 3, I added a new boss with more health and it is larger. I also added more small astroids around the area for level 3.

By Kaijia Joanna Zhan
